BookBlazorExample.States.ProductListStat.Name: Products
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductListStat.Definition: The products displayed in the list

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductListStat.Name: InStockOnly
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductListStat.Definition: Whether the products in the list are filtered to show only those that are in stock

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductListStat.Name: FilterText
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductListStat.Definition: Whether the products in the list are filtered to show only those whose names contains FilterText

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: Id
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: The product's unique ID

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: Name
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: The product's name

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: Price
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: The product's price

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: IsInStock
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Reflects whether the product is in stock

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: CategoryId
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Identifies the product's category

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: NameIsMissing
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines whether state.Name, which is required, is missing.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: NameIsTooLong
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines whether state.Name is too long (100 chars max).

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: NameIsInUse
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines whether state.Name, which must be unique, is already in use.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: NameIsInvalid
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines whether state.Name is invalid. If it is invalid, InvalidNameErrorMessage has a value indicating why.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: InvalidNameErrorMessage
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines the validation error message in case state.NameIsInvalid equals true.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: PriceIsInvalid
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines whether state.Price is invalid. If it is invalid, InvalidPriceErrorMessage has a value indicating why.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: InvalidPriceErrorMessage
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines the validation error message in case state.PriceIsInvalid equals true.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: CategoryIsInvalid
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines whether state.CategoryId is invalid. If it is invalid, InvalidCategoryErrorMessage has a value indicating why.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: InvalidCategoryErrorMessage
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Defines the validation error message in case state.CategoryIsInvalid equals true.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: ProductIsInvalid
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition:
Defines whether the product is invalid, i.e. whether any of its properties is invalid.
            If it is invalid, submits are disabled and the ErrorSummary is displayed.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: ExistingProductNames
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Existing product names (all not null and not empty)

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: NameIsRequired
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Error message indicating that the product's name must be supplied.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: NameHasMaxLength
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Error message indicating that the product's name's maximum length has been exceeded.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: NameNotUnique
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Error message indicating that the product's name is not unque.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: PriceRequired
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Error message indicating that the product's price must be supplied.

BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Name: CategoryRequired
BookBlazorExample.States.ProductFormStat.Definition: Error message indicating that the product's category must be supplied.
